        You play a young beardless dwarf who dreams about adventures and
        heroic deeds. Usually dwarves have beards, but for some mystical
        reasons beard of our hero is not grows. So he decide to make a
        journey with his friend the bat to solve this problem. During the
        game you control a group of units each with its own specialities
        and features. Units can get levels and transform into other forms
        by your choice. Combats is turn based but fast due to clever
        control system.


        Features

        Ã‚Â· Fresh battle system. It is turn based but feels like an action
        Ã‚Â· Hundreds of units. And you can get anyone to your team (even
          foes)
        Ã‚Â· Humorous plot and unique description of every game element
        Ã‚Â· RPG-elements like inventory and unit classes
        Ã‚Â· Units evolution and selection of specialization on every 5th
          level-up


        Game System Requirements:

        Ã‚Â· Operating System: Windows XP or better.
        Ã‚Â· Processor: Pentium 4 or better.
        Ã‚Â· Processor Speed: 1GHz or better.
        Ã‚Â· System RAM: 256 MB or more.
        Ã‚Â· Video RAM: 256 MB or more.
        Ã‚Â· Video Driver:DirectX 9 or better.
        Ã‚Â· Hard Drive: 300 MB free hard drive space or more.
